subject: Relocation of Business
Basketball
Stadiums and Arenas
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. announced the sale of the New Orleans Hornets to the owner of the Saints for $338 million. But the league faced the real possibility that the Sacramento Kings would move.
snippet: The N.B.A. announced the sale of the New Orleans Hornets to the owner of the Saints for $338 million. But the league faced the real possibility that the Sacramento Kings would move.
